Guilherme Agreli

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/0165371547632976
  • Última atualização do currículo em 23/07/2019

Mr. Guilherme Agreli BSc, MBA is the Director of Research & Development at Products and Features Brasil Pesquisa e Desenvolvimento LTDA. Mr. Agreli has in excess of 10 years? experience leading teams that integrate science and emerging technologies with the development and manufacture of minimally invasive medical devices. Mr. Agreli is committed to advancing product design and innovation by applying sound science and vigorous design and development protocols in order to expediently bring our products to market and advance the future of healthcare. Mr. Agreli has development and leads collaborative programs with physicians to ensure their products are targeted and relevant; from clinical problem identification, product development and training on the safe and effective deployment of our products, thus ensuring optimized patient outcomes. Mr. Agreli holds a BSc in from the University of San Paulo, (USP) Brazil in Medical Physics and an MBA from the University Fundacao Getulio Vargas. San Paulo (FGV). Mr. Agreli is the co-author of several published papers focused on the integration of technology into new medical devices; Mr. Agreli is a co-inventor of seven patents related to implantable medical devices. (Texto informado pelo autor)
